original: Brolin, Sten Adam Valdemar, provinsialläkare, Gamleby, f. 22/12/98 i Söderhamn av Carl B. o. Hulda Andersson. G. 32 m. Aina Elin Elise Annerstedt. Barn: Kerstin Elisabeth f. 35, Hans Johan 38. — Stud:ex. 17, med. kand. 20 o. med. lic. 25 i S-thlm. Tf. und:läk. v. Garphytte san. 24-25, div. förordn. v. Härnösands las. 25-26, tf. und :läk. v. Varbergs las. 27, andre und:läk. v. Kalm. las. 27-29, förste und:läk. 29-30, tf. prov:läk. i Åtvidabergs distr. 31, i Emmaboda distr. 31-32 o. i Häljebols distr. 32, und:läk. v. Eksjö san. 32-33, tf. prov:-läk. i Sunne distr. 33-34, prov:läk. i Indals-Lidens distr. 34, i Gamleby distr. sed. 44.
translated: Brolin, Sten Adam Valdemar, district physician, Gamleby, b. December 22nd, 1898 in Söderhamn to Carl B. and Hulda Andersson. Married Aina Elin Elise Annerstedt in 1932, with whom he had two children: Kerstin Elisabeth b. 1935 and Hans Johan b. 1938. He received his high school diploma in 1917, Bachelor of Medicine in 1920, and doctorate in medicine in 1925, all in Stockholm. He served as acting physician at Garphytte sanatorium in 1924-1925, held various appointments at Härnösand Hospital in 1925-1926, acted as acting physician at Varberg Hospital in 1927, served as second and first acting physician at Kalmar Hospital in 1927-1930, acted as acting district physician in Åtvidaberg in 1931, in Emmaboda in 1931-1932, and in Häljebols in 1932. He was also a physician at Eksjö Sanatorium in 1932-1933, acting district physician in Sunne in 1933-1934, and was appointed district physician in Indals-Lidens in 1934 and in Gamleby from 1944 onwards.
